default.description: Enemies drop a total of 9 clear particles

custom.description: Enter the number of clear particles dropped by enemies

data.helpFlexible: Albedo's skill triggers every 2.5s and distributes its particles based on time spent on field. Albedo C1 gains 1.2 energy per E trigger. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Albedo's skill triggers every 2.5s and distributes its particles based on time spent on field. Albedo C1 gains 1.2 energy per E trigger. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Feed Amber's particles to whoever will be on field when Baron Bunny explodes.
data.helpFixed: Feed Amber's particles to whoever will be on field when Baron Bunny explodes.

data.helpFlexible: Arlecchino's burst resets her skill cooldown. Arlecchino's Normal Attacks reduce her skill cooldown by .8s on hit. Arlecchino's C4 gives her 15 energy on burst. But this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.
data.helpFixed: Arlecchino's burst resets her skill cooldown. Arlecchino's Normal Attacks reduce her skill cooldown by .8s on hit. Arlecchino's C4 gives her 15 energy on burst. But this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Ayato's A4 gives him 2 energy per second if he is not on field and has less than 40 energy. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Hybrid Ayato does one attack after each E before swapping out.
data.helpFixed: Ayato's A4 gives him 2 energy per second if he is not on field and has less than 40 energy. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Hybrid Ayato does one attack after each E before swapping out.

data.helpFlexible: Barbara C1 gains 1 energy per 10 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Barbara C1 gains 1 energy per 10 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Beidou's skill type is how many times she gets hit while holding her skill.
data.helpFixed: Beidou's skill type is how many times she gets hit while holding her skill.

data.helpFlexible: If Tartaglia is using ranged burst, put 20 in "Bonus non-particle energy". Use the "Aimed Shot" skill in "Skill uses (other type)" for the number of aimed shots done in ranged form.
data.helpFixed: If Tartaglia is using ranged burst, put 20 in "Bonus non-particle energy". Use the "Aimed Shot" skill in "Skill uses (other type)" for the number of aimed shots done in ranged form.

data.helpFlexible: When enemies marked by Charlotte's skill are defeated, its cooldown is reduced by 2s, up to a maximum of 8s. Charlotte's C4 gives her 2 flat energy for each marked enemy hit by her burst, up to 10.
data.helpFixed: When enemies marked by Charlotte's skill are defeated, its cooldown is reduced by 2s, up to a maximum of 8s. Charlotte's C4 gives her 2 flat energy for each marked enemy hit by her burst, up to 10.

data.helpFlexible: Chasca's C4 restores up to 9 energy per Burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Chasca's C4 restores up to 9 energy per Burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Chevreuse's C1 gives 6 energy to any ally with the Coordinated Tactics status that triggers Overload, once per 10 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Chevreuse's C1 gives 6 energy to any ally with the Coordinated Tactics status that triggers Overload, once per 10 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Chongyun C4 regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo, once per 2 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Chongyun C4 regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by Cryo, once per 2 seconds. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Citlali's C4 restores 8 energy per Skill. The "Constellation 4" Skill use already counts this.
data.helpFixed: Citlali's C4 restores 8 energy per Skill. The "Constellation 4" Skill use already counts this.

data.helpFlexible: Swift Hunt, Impale the Night, C1, and C6 share particle ICD of 2s. This results in 4 particles per skill. Put one Skill use per full Skill uptime used.
data.helpFixed: Swift Hunt, Impale the Night, C1, and C6 share particle ICD of 2s. This results in 4 particles per skill. Put one Skill use per full Skill uptime used.

data.helpFlexible: Collei's C1 gives her 20% ER when not on field. This reduces her ER needs by about 10%.
data.helpFixed: Collei's C1 gives her 20% ER when not on field. This reduces her ER needs by about 10%.

data.helpFlexible: Cyno's skill generates fewer particles during his burst. Cyno's C4 gives all other party members 3 energy per reaction triggered, up to 15 energy. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Cyno's skill generates fewer particles during his burst. Cyno's C4 gives all other party members 3 energy per reaction triggered, up to 15 energy. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Dehya's skill doesn't generate particles while Dehya is using her burst. Dehya's C4 gives her a total of 15 energy per burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Dehya's C4 gives her a total of 15 energy per burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: One use of Diluc's skill represents a full three-skill combo.
data.helpFixed: One use of Diluc's skill represents a full three-skill combo.
data.errorFlexible: One use of Diluc's skill represents a full three-skill combo.
data.errorFixed: One use of Diluc's skill represents a full three-skill combo.

data.helpFlexible: Diona C1 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Diona C1 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Dori's A4 is already factored in, don't give her flat energy. Dori's C4 means some of your characters may need slighly less ER than recommended.
data.helpFixed: Dori's A4 is already factored in, don't give her flat energy. Dori's C4 means some of your characters may need slighly less ER than recommended.

data.helpFlexible: Only level 1-2 Lumidouce Cases generate particles. As Emilie's Burst replaces her case, you will miss one particle.
data.helpFixed: Only level 1-2 Lumidouce Cases generate particles. As Emilie's Burst replaces her case, you will miss one particle.

data.helpFlexible: Faruzan only generates particles when she uses an aimed shot after her skill, or when C6 triggers, with a shared 5.5s ICD. C4 gives her 2-4 energy per skill use or C6 trigger, with no ICD.
data.helpFixed: Faruzan only generates particles when she uses an aimed shot after her skill, or when C6 triggers, with a shared 5.5s ICD. C4 gives her 2-4 energy per skill use or C6 trigger, with no ICD.

data.helpFlexible: The Oz generated by Fischl's burst doesn't count as a skill use. "Skill uses per burst" should be the number of times you summon Oz with the skill (E) specifically.
data.helpFixed: The Oz generated by Fischl's burst doesn't count as a skill use. "Skill uses per rotation" should be 0.5 if you use Fischl burst every second rotation.
data.errorFlexible: The Oz generated by Fischl's burst doesn't count as a skill use. "Skill uses per burst" should be the number of times you summon Oz with the skill (E) specifically.
data.errorFixed: The Oz generated by Fischl's burst doesn't count as a skill use. "Skill uses per rotation" should be 0.5 if you use Fischl burst every second rotation.

data.helpFlexible: Freminet's burst resets his skill cooldown and reduces its cooldown to 3s. His A1 reduces his skill cooldown by 1s if unleashed at level 1-3. His C2 restores 2-3 energy per skill use.
data.helpFixed: Freminet's burst resets his skill cooldown and reduces its cooldown to 3s. His A1 reduces his skill cooldown by 1s if unleashed at level 1-3. His C2 restores 2-3 energy per skill use.

data.helpFlexible: Furina's C4 gives her 0.8 energy per second while her skill is active. Multiply this by Furina's "time between bursts" and put this in "Bonus non-particle energy"
data.helpFixed: Furina's C4 gives her 0.8 energy per second while her skill is active. Multiply this by the rotation length and put this in "Bonus non-particle energy"

data.helpFlexible: Gaming generates particles when he uses Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider, with a 3 second ICD. Gaming's C4 adds an additional 2 flat energy per enemy hit. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Gaming generates particles when he uses Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider, with a 3 second ICD. Gaming's C4 adds an additional 2 flat energy per enemy hit. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Feed half of Ganyu's particles to whoever will be on field when the Ice Lotus explodes. Ganyu C1 gives her 2 energy per charged shot. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Feed half of Ganyu's particles to whoever will be on field when the Ice Lotus explodes. Ganyu C1 gives her 2 energy per charged shot. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Heizou gains stacks by triggering swirl reactions or by holding his elemental skill. Heizou's C4 gives him 13.5 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Heizou's C4 gives him 13.5 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Hu Tao's skill use assumes 2 particle generation triggers. Hu Tao doesn't generally need to burst every rotation.
data.helpFixed: Hu Tao's skill use assumes 2 particle generation triggers. Hu Tao doesn't generally need to burst every rotation.

data.helpFlexible: Itto C2 gives him 6-18 energy on burst, depending on the number of Geo characters in the team. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Itto C2 gives him 6-18 energy on burst, depending on the number of Geo characters in the team. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Jean's burst cost is reduced by 16 due to her A4 passive.
data.helpFixed: Jean's burst cost is reduced by 16 due to her A4 passive.
data.errorFlexible: The discount on Jean's burst from her A4 passive is already included and does not need to be in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.errorFixed: The discount on Jean's burst from her A4 passive is already included and does not need to be in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Kachina generates particles per skill hit. If Nightsoul points are used to move around, she may generate less energy. C2 adds skill hits. Add .33 skills if C2.
data.helpFixed: Kachina generates particles per skill hit. If Nighsoul points are used to move around, she may generate less energy. C2 adds skill hits. Add .33 skills if C2.

data.helpFlexible: Kaeya's skill type is determined by the number of enemies he freezes with his skill. Kaeya's C6 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Kaeya's skill type is determined by the number of enemies he freezes with his skill. Kaeya's C6 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Keqing's C2 can trigger at most once per 5 seconds.
data.helpFixed: Keqing's C2 can trigger at most once per 5 seconds.

data.helpFlexible: Kirara can generate up to one collision particle every 4 seconds when using her hold skill, with the first particle being generated immediately
data.helpFixed: Kirara can generate up to one collision particle every 4 seconds when using her hold skill, with the first particle being generated immediately

data.helpFlexible: Kinich's Scalespiker Cannon can generate particles once per Skill use. Kinich's C4 restores 5 Energy after using Loop Shots or Scalespiker Cannon. Put this in "Bonus non-particle Energy"
Klee's A4 gives every team member 2 energy whenever her charged attack crits. Put this in every character's "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Klee's A4 gives every team member 2 energy whenever her charged attack crits. Put this in every character's "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Kokomi's skill type determines whether her burst refreshes her jellyfish.
data.helpFixed: Kokomi's skill type determines whether her burst refreshes her jellyfish.
data.errorFlexible: Kokomi's skill distributes particles based on time spent on field. Kokomi's burst refreshes her jellyfish.
data.errorFixed: Kokomi's skill distributes particles based on time spent on field. Kokomi's burst refreshes her jellyfish.

data.helpFlexible: Kuki Shinobu's C4 triggers 3 times and has a 45% chance of generating a particle on each trigger
data.helpFixed: Kuki Shinobu's C4 triggers 3 times and has a 45% chance of generating a particle on each trigger

data.helpFlexible: Layla's C2 gives her 4 energy per volley of shooting stars. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Layla's C2 gives her 4 energy per volley of shooting stars. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Lisa's C1 gives her 2 energy per enemy hit with her held skill. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Lisa's C1 gives her 2 energy per enemy hit with her held skill. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Lynette's C4 gives her an extra charge on her elemental skill.
data.helpFixed: Lynette's C4 gives her an extra charge on her elemental skill.

data.helpFlexible: Lyney gets 3 energy whenever he consumes HP using a fully-charged attack. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Lyney gets 3 energy whenever he consumes HP using a fully-charged attack. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Mavuika does not use Energy to Burst. Ignore her energy requirement.
data.helpFixed: Mavuika does not use Energy to Burst. Ignore her energy requirement.

data.helpFlexible: Mika's C4 gives him up to 15 energy per burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Mika's C4 gives him up to 15 energy per burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Feed Mona's particles to whoever will be on field when her skill explodes.
data.helpFixed: Feed Mona's particles to whoever will be on field when her skill explodes.
data.errorFlexible: Feed Mona's particles to whoever will be on field when her skill explodes.
data.errorFixed: Feed Mona's particles to whoever will be on field when her skill explodes.

data.helpFlexible: Mualani's Sharky Bites can generate particles once per Skill use. Mualani's C4 restores 8 energy per puffer. She will gain 2 puffers per Skill.  Put this in "Bonus non-particle Energy"
data.helpFixed: Mualani's Sharky Bites can generate particles once per Skill use. Mualani's C4 restores 8 energy per puffer. She will gain 2 puffers per Skill.

data.helpFlexible: Nahida's skill generates 3 particles every 8.25 seconds on average.
data.helpFixed: Nahida's skill generates 3 particles every 8.25 seconds on average.

data.helpFlexible: Navia's C1 gives her 3 flat energy per Crystal Shrapnel stack consumed, up to a maximum of 9. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Navia's C1 gives her 3 flat energy per Crystal Shrapnel stack consumed, up to a maximum of 9. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Nilou's C4 gives her 15 energy per skill use. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Nilou's C4 gives her 15 energy per skill use. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Ningguang's skill only generates particles if she waits at least 6 seconds between skill uses. Do not include skill uses which do not generate particles.
data.helpFixed: Ningguang's skill only generates particles if she waits at least 6 seconds between skill uses. Do not include skill uses which do not generate particles.

data.helpFlexible: Noelle's burst typically lasts longer than 15 seconds due to hitlag, so you can burst every 20 seconds and still have full uptime.
data.helpFixed: Noelle's burst typically lasts longer than 15 seconds due to hitlag, so you can burst every 20 seconds and still have full uptime.

data.helpFlexible: Ororon's C4 restores 8 flat energy after his burst. Ororon's A4 restores 3 energy 3 times to him and your on-fielder. The 9 energy from this is already considered in his skill. Put this in 'Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Ororon's C4 restores 8 flat energy after his burst. Ororon's A4 restores 3 energy 3 times to him and your on-fielder. The 9 energy from this is already considered in his skill. Put this in 'Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Qiqi's C1 gives her 2 energy per hit with her Herald of Frost. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Qiqi's C1 gives her 2 energy per hit with her Herald of Frost. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Raiden's burst gives the entire team energy based on Raiden's ER, typically 20-25 energy. Put this in every character's "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Raiden's burst gives the entire team energy based on Raiden's ER, typically 20-25 energy. Put this in every character's "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Don't include Razor's skill uses during his burst, as they don't generate particles. Razor's burst cost is reduced by 5, and his ER needs reduced by 45%, to account for his talents.
data.helpFixed: Don't include Razor's skill uses during his burst, as they don't generate particles. Razor's burst cost is reduced by 5, and his ER needs reduced by 45%, to account for his talents.

data.helpFlexible: Rosaria's C4 gives her 5 energy when her skill crits. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Rosaria's C4 gives her 5 energy when her skill crits. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Sara only generates particles when she uses an aimed shot after her skill, even with C2. Sara's A4 gives the party 1.2 energy for every 100% ER she has. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Sara only generates particles when she uses an aimed shot after her skill, even with C2. Sara's A4 gives the party 1.2 energy for every 100% ER she has. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: If Sethos does not use his burst, switch to fixed rotation mode (cell C5).
data.helpFixed: If Sethos does not use his burst, put 0 in "Number of rotations between bursts".

data.helpFlexible: If Tartaglia is using ranged burst, put 20 in "Bonus non-particle energy". Use the "Aimed Shot" skill in "Skill uses (other type)" for the number of aimed shots done in ranged form.
data.helpFixed: If Tartaglia is using ranged burst, put 20 in "Bonus non-particle energy". Use the "Aimed Shot" skill in "Skill uses (other type)" for the number of aimed shots done in ranged form.

data.helpFlexible: Thoma C4 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Thoma C4 gains 15 energy on burst. Put this in "Bonus non-particle energy". Divide this energy by the number of rotations between bursts.

data.helpFlexible: Anemo Traveler's C2 is ignored, since it appears in their stats screen
data.helpFixed: Anemo Traveler's C2 is ignored, since it appears in their stats screen

data.helpFlexible: Dendro Traveler's C1 is already factored in and does not need to be added to "Bonus non-particle energy".
data.helpFixed: Dendro Traveler's C1 is already factored in and does not need to be added to "Bonus non-particle energy".

data.helpFlexible: Electro Traveler's skill generates 12 energy. Their burst gives about 16 energy. Put these in the "Bonus non-particle energy" of whoever uses them. Also consider the amulet ER bonus.
data.helpFixed: Electro Traveler's skill generates 12 energy. Their burst gives about 16 energy. Put these in the "Bonus non-particle energy" of whoever uses them. Also consider the amulet ER bonus.

data.helpFlexible: Geo Traveler's C2 is ignored, since it appears in their stats screen
data.helpFixed: Geo Traveler's C2 is ignored, since it appears in their stats screen

data.helpFlexible: Venti's A4 gives him 15 energy after his burst ends
data.helpFixed: Venti's A4 gives him 15 energy after his burst ends

data.helpFlexible: Xiao's C1 gives him an extra charge
data.helpFixed: Xiao's C1 gives him an extra charge

data.helpFlexible: Yae's skill has 3 charges
data.helpFixed: Yae's skill has 3 charges

data.helpFixed: Zhongli's skill has a 50% chance to generate a particle on hit, which occurs every 2s
